FMG Young Farmer of the Year 2025: Aorangi regional final won by Gareth McKerchar https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/fmg-young-farmer-farmer-of-the-the-the-the-2025-aorangi- griginal-riginal-final-final-won-by-gareth-mckerchar/yuejvdvmorbcfppehavae464644ddy/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/fmg-young-farmer-farmer-of-the-the-the-the-2025-aorangi- griginal-riginal-final-final-won-by-gareth-mckerchar/yuejvdvmorbcfppehavae464644ddy/ Gareth McKerchar has won the Aorangi Young Farmer of the Year for the second year in a row Mon, 31 Mar 2025 03:00:00 +0000 Jack Taggart (second), winner Gareth McKerchar, and third placegetter Samuel Allen at the Young Farmer of the Year Aorangi regional final.
Mōrere Hot Springs closed again, hopes to reopen before Easter https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/morere-hot-springs-closed-closed-closed-hopes-hopes-to-reopen-to-reopen-beorefore-fore-fore-chgvedgddzelff3z3iwhy3s7nq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/morere-hot-springs-closed-closed-closed-hopes-hopes-to-reopen-to-reopen-beorefore-fore-fore-chgvedgddzelff3z3iwhy3s7nq/ The natural saltwater hot springs had only reopened three months earlier after two years. Mon, 31 Mar 2025 03:00:00 +0000 Mōrere Hot Springs will likely be closed for weeks after an issue at the spring’s hot water collection point was discovered. It comes only three months after the site reopened following closures that lasted two years. Photo / Supplied
